body_html: @ShawnXuan - these are files in the cloned bazel repo. The change proposed on StackOverflow for example would be made to CPU.java as shown in the diff. You can see which files elirex changed in addition by looking at their diff. Hope that helps

body: @ShawnXuan - these are files in the cloned bazel repo. The change proposed on StackOverflow for example would be made to [CPU.java](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/blob/master/src/main/java/com/google/devtools/build/lib/util/CPU.java) as shown in the diff. You can see which files elirex changed in addition by looking at their diff. Hope that helps
